short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find company details on LinkedIn profile pages without opening a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See company information without exiting the profile page.
On any user profile you can see the summary and details for each company they worked at

Save yourself needless clicks and your precious time :)
